Reading up on the profile attribute (http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3236.txt). =
Seems like a good choice for the purpose of defining the vocabulary/encodin=
g used to embed data in XHTML.

The spec says though "It is primarily targe=
ted for use on the network by proxies in the HTTP chain that manipulate dat=
a formats (such as transcoders).". My application is not a proxy - so maybe=
 this is what is meant by "you also do not know which intermediary will sil=
ently strip the param (which it may)"?

/J=F8rn
